attributes.action: Get lorry drivers OFF mobile phones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I drive 100 miles per day to and from my place of work.  I am sickened by the amount of lorry drivers who blatently use their mobile phones and worse still the texting that goes on is massive!  Who do they think they are?? Many deaths each year must be caused by this and why aren't the police enforcing the law?

rejection.details: Law enforcement is a matter for the police.  If you wish to complain about the police, you may wish to consider contacting the Independent Police Complaints Commission.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
